idea-plugin.name: iCommenter
idea-plugin.description:
iCommenter: a PyCharm plugin used to generate python code comment automatically
Users can invoke the plug-in by moving the cursor to the inside of the target function body and pressing the keyboard shortcuts “shift + c”. It can also be invoked by right-clicking generateComment button in the Generate group. Then plug-in will automatically generate the comment and insert it after clicking apply button.

iCommenter：一个应用于PyCharm上的自动化python代码注释生成插件
用户可以通过将光标移动至目标函数体内部并选择快捷键shift + c，或右键选择Generate -> generateComment来调用插件。 此后插件将自动生成注释结果并在点击apply按钮后完成插入。
